trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of decoration to be added to list items.
trans-unit.target: 指定要加入至清單項目裝飾的類型。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The ListDecoration enumeration represents how you will specify decoration for a list, as bullets, numbers, or no decoration at all.
trans-unit.target: ListDecoration 列舉，代表將會指定裝飾，如需清單，為項目符號、 數字或無裝飾完全。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET, you specify the type of decoration for a list by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Decoration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 中，您必須指定類型的清單裝飾藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Decoration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Decoration%2A>

trans-unit.source: List items are decorated with a bullet.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項目符號清單項目。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: List items are decorated with a number.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。
